name: Candy's ghost
description:
Summary :

Welcome to Candy's Ghost ! 
Your goal is simple, get as much candies as you can before the timer end !
But beware of the ghost player, he will try to steal your candies and possess you !

Context:

Project realised during Gaming Campus gamejam (3 days) in november 2022.

The theme of the gamejam was "halloween", and multiplayer was mandatory.

Credit :

- Leo CHABERT, Game Dev (Network, PostProcess, GamePlay, UI/UX, VFX, LevelDesign)

- Julien COUTOULY, Game Dev (UI/UX, LevelDesign)

- Robin DOUET, Game Dev (UI/UX, LevelDesign)

- Fabien MOGADE, Producer & Game Dev (UI/UX, Network, GamePlay)

- David NGUYEN, Game Dev (Network, UI/UX)

- Flupi, Game Dev (Network, GamePlay, UI/UX)
